Class CourseGroup

  • Object
    • CourseGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CourseGroup
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Entity class for storing information about the course group
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void printInfo()
      Prints lesson information for this course
      String removeFromConfirmedStudent(String matricNumber)
      Removes a confirmed student if there are students in the waitlist, enrol the first student from waiting list and return the matriculation number of this student This is so that we can add the course to the student using studentmanager later And send an email to the waitlist student to inform them.

      • isConfirmedStudent

        public boolean isConfirmedStudent(String matricNumber)
        Checks if student is in this course group
        Parameters:
        matricNumber -
        Returns:
        false: student is not in this course group
      • true: sudent is in this course group

      • enrol

        public Boolean enrol(String matricNumber)
        Returns status of the enrolment and enrols the student if successful If the course group is full, student is added into waitlist If the course group is not full, student is directly added
        Parameters:
        matricNumber -
        Returns:
        true: enrolment was successful
      • false: enrolment is pending (the course is full)

      • isWaitlistStudent

        public boolean isWaitlistStudent(String matricNumber)
        To check if student is currently in the waitlist of this course group. This is used in enrolment to prevent the student from being added to the waitlist multiple times.
        Parameters:
        matricNumber -
        Returns:
        true: student is in waitlist for this coursegroup
      • false: student is not in the waitlist for this course group

      • removeWaitlistStudent

        public void removeWaitlistStudent(String matricNumber)
        Removes student from the waitlist of this course group
        Parameters:
        matricNumber -

      • swapStudent

        public void swapStudent(String matricToRemove,
                        String matricToAdd)
        Swaps the two students. We assume that the student to be removed has been checked to be in this course.
        Parameters:
        matricToRemove - : matriculation number of the student to remove from this course
        matricToAdd - : matriculation number of the student to add to this course

      • getTotalSize

        public int getTotalSize()
        Getter for total size
        Returns:
        totalsize

      • removeFromConfirmedStudent

        public String removeFromConfirmedStudent(String matricNumber)
        Removes a confirmed student
      • if there are students in the waitlist, enrol the first student from waiting list and return the matriculation number of this student
      • This is so that we can add the course to the student using studentmanager later
      • And send an email to the waitlist student to inform them.
Parameters:
matricNumber -
Returns:
matriculation number of the first student from waitlist
  • null: when there is no one in the waitlist
